#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  MultiStringMarshallable cmd{};
  auto oid_str = std::to_string(oid);
  cmd.data_.push_back(oid_str);
  cmd.data_.push_back("put");
  cmd.data_.push_back(k);
  cmd.data_.push_back(v);


  std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> s = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>(cmd);
  uint64_t log_index, log_term;
  auto status = GetRaftServer().Start(s, &log_index, &log_term);
  if(!status) {
      Log_info("Request skipped, not a leader");
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Log_info("Performing put on (%s, %s)", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  Coroutine::CreateRun([this, &event, &oid_str]() {
      std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
      cv_.wait_for(lk, timeout_, [this, &oid_str]() {
          if(oid_set_.find(oid_str) != oid_set_.end()) return true;
          return false;
      });
      event->Set(0);
  });

  event->Wait(500 * 1000);
  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
  if(oid_set_.find(oid_str) == oid_set_.end()) {
      if(!is_leader()) {
          return KV_NOTLEADER;
      }

      Log_info("Put timedout");
//      return KV_NOTLEADER;
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

//  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
//  auto success = cv_.wait_for(lk, timeout_, [this, &oid_str]() {
//      return oid_set_.find(oid_str) != oid_set_.end();
//  });
//
//  if(!success) {
//      return KV_TIMEOUT;
//  }

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    MultiStringMarshallable cmd{};
    auto oid_str = std::to_string(oid);
    cmd.data_.push_back(oid_str);
    cmd.data_.push_back("append");
    cmd.data_.push_back(k);
    cmd.data_.push_back(v);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> s = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>(cmd);
    uint64_t log_index, log_term;
    auto status = GetRaftServer().Start(s, &log_index, &log_term);
    if(!status) {
        Log_info("Request skipped, not a leader");
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    Log_info("Performing append on (%s, %s)", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    Coroutine::CreateRun([this, &event, &oid_str]() {
        std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
        cv_.wait_for(lk, timeout_, [this, &oid_str]() {
            if(oid_set_.find(oid_str) != oid_set_.end()) return true;
            return false;
        });
        event->Set(0);
    });

    event->Wait(500 * 1000);
    std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
    if(oid_set_.find(oid_str) == oid_set_.end()) {
        if(!is_leader()) {
            return KV_NOTLEADER;
        }

        Log_info("Append timedout");
//        return KV_NOTLEADER;
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

//    std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
//    auto success = cv_.wait_for(lk, timeout_, [this, &oid_str]() {
//        return oid_set_.find(oid_str) != oid_set_.end();
//    });
//
//    if(!success) {
//        return KV_TIMEOUT;
//    }

    return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    MultiStringMarshallable cmd{};
    auto oid_str = std::to_string(oid);
    cmd.data_.push_back(oid_str);
    cmd.data_.push_back("get");
    cmd.data_.push_back(k);
    cmd.data_.push_back("");


    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> s = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>(cmd);
    uint64_t log_index, log_term;
    auto status = GetRaftServer().Start(s, &log_index, &log_term);
    if(!status) {
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    Log_info("Performing get on (%s)", k.c_str());
    auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    Coroutine::CreateRun([this, &event, &oid_str]() {
        std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
        cv_.wait_for(lk, timeout_, [this, &oid_str]() {
            if(oid_set_.find(oid_str) != oid_set_.end()) return true;
            return false;
        });
        event->Set(0);
    });

    event->Wait(500 * 1000);
    std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
    if(oid_set_.find(oid_str) == oid_set_.end()) {
        if(!is_leader()) {
            return KV_NOTLEADER;
        }

        Log_info("Get timedout");
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

    *v = kv_[k];
//    std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
//    auto success = cv_.wait_for(lk, timeout_, [this, &k]() {
//        return kv_.find(k) != kv_.end();
//    });
//
//    if(!success) {
//        return KV_TIMEOUT;
//    }
//
//    *v = kv_[k];
    Log_info("Get result (%s, %s)", k.c_str(), v->c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
  auto oid = v->data_[0];


  auto op = v->data_[1];
  auto key = v->data_[2];
  auto val = v->data_[3];

  if(op == "put") {
      kv_[key] = val;
      Log_info("Inserting (%s, %s)", key.c_str(), val.c_str());
  } else if(op == "append") {
      kv_[key] += val;
      Log_info("Updating (%s, %s -> %s)", key.c_str(), val.c_str(), kv_[key].c_str());
  }

  oid_set_.insert(oid);
  cv_.notify_all();
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

bool KvServer::is_leader() {
    uint64_t term;
    bool is_leader;
    GetRaftServer().GetState(&is_leader, &term);
    return is_leader;
}

} // namespace janus;
